summary: Implemented new TrustBadge SVG component and updated Header/Footer and index.html to reference new STYO Tech Neon logo asset paths. However, the diff summary does not show the actual logo asset files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and several unrelated UI/routes/hooks/config changes appear to be included beyond the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add the official STYO primary logo assets (Tech Neon full + icon-only + white monochrome), each as SVG and transparent PNG, under frontend/public/assets/generated using the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows code referencing the new filenames/paths, but no added files under frontend/public/assets/generated are included in the diff summary. Only a TSX component file is shown as added.
evidence: <file-diff>: ADDED FILES only lists frontend/src/components/TrustBadge.tsx (no assets listed)

hallucinated_features.description: Added new application routes/pages for Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Refund Policy.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1..REQ-4; explicitly out of scope aside from logo swap points and adding verified badge component.

hallucinated_features.description: Redesigned/optimized HomePage and BookingSteps with new Step 3 content and CTAs, plus additional trust indicators.
hallucinated_features.reason: UI redesign beyond swapping logo usage points and adding the verified badge component was a stated non-goal.

hallucinated_features.description: Major HeroSection visual redesign (parallax backdrop, 3D category boxes, animated map, glowing CTAs).
Added/changed category grid content and presentation (7 category cards with hover effects and gradient overlays).
FeaturedListings behavior change to cycle through three card design variants.
ExploreSection updated to include additional trust badges (e.g., “PG found in 24h, Verified & Trusted”).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only ListingCard verified badge replacement was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal updated to include additional UserProfile fields (registrationDate, lastLogin, ipAddress) with defaults.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and contradicts the general constraint of no backend field/workflow additions (even if frontend-only, it’s unrelated to the requested work).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded React Query hooks for property status transitions and expired listing cleanup (useUpdatePropertyStatus/useProcessExpiredListings).
Changed global CSS for animations/performance/accessibility and updated Tailwind config with extended tokens and glow utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to implementing logos/badge component and swap points.
